column1: Phlegmatic  The weather becomes Calm.

column2: Fo.Atk is boosted by 30%. No sand damage is received.

column2: Speed is doubled. No sand damage is received.

column2: Speed is doubled.

column1: Weather Resist  This Puppet is immune to the effects of weather and weather based abilities.

column2: you will always restore them.

column1: Inverse Reaction  When hit by a Light or Dark-type skill only half the damage is taken.

column2: FoDef is boosted by 50%.

column1: Vigorous  Takes half the turns to return from stop status.
Maintenance  30% chance to heal from ailments every turn.

Some Guts  Damage the opponent after receiving an attack of 90 or more BP.
Karmic Retribution  Damage the opponent after receiving an attack of 90 or more BP.
Hate Incarnate  Damage the opponent if fainting is caused by an attack of 70 or more BP.

Dark Force  Opponent has 10% chance to become blinded from their focus attacks.

Jamming  Reduces the opponent's Speed after receiving an attack of 80 or more BP.
Discourager  Reduces the opponent's FoAtk when hit by a skill that your barrier resists.

column1: Insight  Easier to score critical hits.

column1: Overwhelm  Charms cannot be used by either side.
Worrywart  When HP is less than half the held charm is used.
Assault  Attacks have a 10% chance of causing flinching.
Poison Body  After an attack
column2: the opponent has a 30% chance to become poisoned.

column1: Lucky  Secondary effects of skills have double the chance of occurring.

column2: but their secondary effects never occur.

column1: Divine Protection  Stats cannot be lowered by the enemy.

Positive  When a stat is decreased SpAtk is raised sharply.

column2: however it ignores the foe's ability.

column1: Placid  For 5 turns SpAtk and Speed are cut in half. Ability changes to ""Serious""

column1: True Admin  When HP is less than half FoAtk and SpAtk are halved.

column1: Strategist  Attacks with a base power of 60 or below are boosted by 50%.
